question: 事務所
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>place</kanji> where <kanji>action</kanji>s and <kanji>task</kanji>s happen is the <vocabulary>office</vocabulary>. None of that happens at home. The office is more of an action / task place.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
